main.name: Lancy Goyal
main.description: Node.js | React.js | React Native | Vue | AWS
main.bio: I am a Software Engineer with one decade of experience in understanding and analyzing software engineering problems and implementing them. Technologies that I have used to develop the apps are Javascript, Node.js, React.js, React Native, Redux, Vue.js, Express.js, Socket.io, Hapi.js, GraphQL, Meteor.js, MongoDB, SQL, Next.js, Serverless, Firebase, Docker, Git and AWS. I am a technology-driven person with an immense interest in Software Engineering Problems and Designs.

education.description: Completed B.Tech. in Information Technology with First Division.

work.title: Lead Software Engineer
work.description:
- Leading product engineering teams and giving them technical solutions.
- Managing the team of 8-10 members from India and Indonesia.

work.title: Lead Software Engineer
work.description:
- Build the entire tech from scratch and it raised $6.5M in funding from Sequoia India, FALCON EDGE CAPITAL, LP.
- Managed the team of 6-8 engineers from India, Bangladesh and Vietnam.

work.title: Software Consultant
work.description: Worked on Bag Tracking Application which is used internally in emirates and dnata.

work.title: Full Stack Engineer
work.description: Worked on Domestic Money Transfer and Loan Service web application.

work.title: Lead Software Engineer
work.description: Worked on various applications related to Social Networking, EdTech, Event Management, and Job Portal.

testimonials.text: I've had pleasure of working with him. He has the rare combination of intellect and charisma that enables him to be one of the most effective leaders i have ever exposed to. My best wishes to him for continued success. (y)
Not a single day you will find when you haven't learn something new if you are working with him.

I highly recommend Lancy as he has excellent problem solving techniques. He is an excellent software architect. He knows very well how to manage his team as he is very good at management too. Overall he is an allrounder.
